org.jlab.coda.emu.modules

Class ModuleAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.coda.emu.modules.ModuleAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EmuModule, CODAStateMachine, StatedObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dummy, EventRecording, FarmController, FastEventBuilder, RocFixedRateSimulation, RocSimulation, TsFixedRateSimulation, TsSimulation

    public class ModuleAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements EmuModule
    This class contains boilerplate code for implementing a module.
    Author:
    timmer Mar 20, 2014

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  ModuleAdapter.RateCalculatorThread
      This class defines a thread that makes instantaneous rate calculations once every few seconds.

      Number of event producing threads in operation.

      Instantaneous event rate in Hz over the last time period of length statGatheringPeriod.
      protected int goodChunk_X_EtBufSize
      For ET output channels, a suggested value of chunk * ET-buffer-size (bytes) which would be a good match for the current size events being built.

      ID number of this module obtained from config file.

      Object used by Emu to be notified of PRESTART event arrival.

      Thread to calculate event and data rates.

      If true, this module's statistics represents that of the EMU.
      protected static int statGatheringPeriod
      Targeted time period in milliseconds over which instantaneous rates will be calculated.
      protected Statistics statistics
      Handle histogram of event build times.
      protected boolean timeStatsOn
      If true, collect statistics on event build times (performance drag).
      protected int[] timeToBuild
      Histogram of time to build 1 event in nanoseconds (metadata in first 5 elements).
      protected long wordCountTotal
      Sum of the sizes, in 32-bit words, of all evio events written to the outputs.
      protected float wordRate
      Instantaneous word rate in Hz over the last time period of length statGatheringPeriod.

    • Field Detail

      • id

        protected int id
        ID number of this module obtained from config file.

      • eventProducingThreads

        protected int eventProducingThreads
        Number of event producing threads in operation. Each must match up with its own output channel ring buffer.

      • epThreadsSetInConfig

        protected boolean epThreadsSetInConfig
        Were the number of event producing threads explicitly set in config file?

      • name

        protected final java.lang.String name
        Name of this module.

      • errorMsg

        protected java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.lang.String> errorMsg
        Possible error message. reset() sets it back to null. Making this an atomically settable String ensures that only 1 thread at a time can change its value. That way it's only set once per error.

      • emu

        protected final Emu emu
        Emu this module belongs to.

      • logger

        protected final Logger logger
        Logger used to log messages to debug console.

      • moduleState

        protected volatile CODAStateIF moduleState
        State of this module.

      • attributeMap

        protected final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributeMap
        Map containing attributes of this module given in config file.

      • inputChannels

        protected java.util.ArrayList<DataChannel> inputChannels
        ArrayList of DataChannel objects for this module that are inputs. It is only modified in the addInputChannels(ArrayList) and clearChannels() methods and then only by the main EMU thread in prestart. However, other threads (such as the EMU's statistics reporting thread) call methods which use its iterator or getters.

      • outputChannels

        protected java.util.ArrayList<DataChannel> outputChannels
        ArrayList of DataChannel objects that are outputs. Only modified in prestart but used during go when writing module output.

      • inputChannelCount

        protected int inputChannelCount
        Number of output channels.

      • outputChannelCount

        protected int outputChannelCount
        Number of output channels.

      • paused

        protected boolean paused
        User hit PAUSE button if true.

      • endCallback

        protected EmuEventNotify endCallback
        Object used by Emu to be notified of END event arrival.

      • prestartCallback

        protected EmuEventNotify prestartCallback
        Object used by Emu to be notified of PRESTART event arrival.

      • outputOrder

        protected java.nio.ByteOrder outputOrder
        Do we produce big or little endian output in ByteBuffers?

      • inputChanLevels

        protected int[] inputChanLevels
        Array containing, for each input channel, the percentage (0-100) of filled ring space.

      • outputChanLevels

        protected int[] outputChanLevels
        Array containing, for each output channel, the percentage (0-100) of filled ring space.

      • inputChanNames

        protected java.lang.String[] inputChanNames
        Array containing names for each input channel.

      • outputChanNames

        protected java.lang.String[] outputChanNames
        Array containing names for each output channel.

        protected long eventCountTotal
        Total number of evio events written to the outputs.

      • wordCountTotal

        protected long wordCountTotal
        Sum of the sizes, in 32-bit words, of all evio events written to the outputs.

      • eventRate

        protected float eventRate
        Instantaneous event rate in Hz over the last time period of length statGatheringPeriod.

      • wordRate

        protected float wordRate
        Instantaneous word rate in Hz over the last time period of length statGatheringPeriod.

      • maxEventSize

        protected int maxEventSize
        Maximum-sized built event in bytes.

      • minEventSize

        protected int minEventSize
        Minimum-sized built event in bytes.

      • avgEventSize

        protected int avgEventSize
        Average-sized built event in bytes.

      • goodChunk_X_EtBufSize

        protected int goodChunk_X_EtBufSize
        For ET output channels, a suggested value of chunk * ET-buffer-size (bytes) which would be a good match for the current size events being built.

      • timeToBuild

        protected int[] timeToBuild
        Histogram of time to build 1 event in nanoseconds (metadata in first 5 elements).

        Targeted time period in milliseconds over which instantaneous rates will be calculated.

      • representsEmuStatistics

        public boolean representsEmuStatistics()
        If an EMU has more than one module, which module's statistics represent the EMU as a whole needs to be determined. This method returns true if this module's statistics may represent the EMU as a whole. This may be specified in an EMU's xml configuration file by including the attribute statistics="on" in the module definition.
        Specified by:
        representsEmuStatistics in interface EmuModule
        Returns:
        true if this module's statistics represents the EMU, else false.

      • getStatistics

        public java.lang.Object[] getStatistics()

        Get the output statistics of this EmuModule object. The output statistics consists of an array of 2 Longs, 2 Floats, 4 Integers, and 1 int array:

        1. event count (Long)

        2. word count (Long)

        3. event rate in Hz (Float

        4. data rate in kBytes/sec (Float)

        5. max event size in bytes (Integer) if module is an EB

        6. min event size in bytes (Integer) if module is an EB

        7. avg event size in bytes (Integer) if module is an EB

        8. suggested value for chunk*EtBufSize (Integer) if have ET output channel

        9. if EB and switched on, histogram of time to build 1 event in nanoseconds (int array)

        Specified by:
        getStatistics in interface EmuModule
        Returns:
        array of objects containing in order: 1) event count (Long), 2) word count (Long), 3) event rate(Float), 4) data rate (Float), optionally 5) max event byte size (Integer), 6) min event byte size (Integer), 7) average event byte size (Integer), and 8) suggested value for chunk*EtBufSize (Integer) if have ET output channel, or 9) histogram of time to build 1 event in nanosec (int array), or null if no statistics reported for this module.

      • adjustStatistics

        public void adjustStatistics(long eventsAdded,
                             long wordsAdded)
        Adjust the event count and word count reported by this module to run control by added the given numbers. This is necessary in the file output channel when the limit of the disk partition is reached and physics events must be thrown away after passing through the module.
        Specified by:
        adjustStatistics in interface EmuModule
        Parameters:
        eventsAdded - number of events to be added the event count
        wordsAdded - number of words to be added the word count
